text: A complaint may be dismissed on the following grounds:

sections.text: The complaint is deemed to lack merit;
The complainant refuses to cooperate with the investigation; or
If, after the Executive Director refers a complaint for mediation, the complainant willfully fails to participate in good faith in the mediation process.

title.text: Police, Firefighters, Medical Examiner, and Forensic Sciences. (Refs & Annos)

chapter.text: Review of Citizen Complaints Involving Police.
